body:
This function is currently documented as

```
url_for_version(version)
Returns a URL that you can download a new version of this package from.
```

The documentation should state that
- this function is meant to be overloaded in a package
- if so, it should take `self` as first parameter
- the type of the argument `version` is `Version` (is it?)
- a pointer to the documentation of the class `Version`, so that I see what methods it defines
title: Update documentation of `url_for_version`
